title: Pinterest, Bakkt, Tesla, Facebook: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Pinterest shares slumped after PayPal said it isn’t pursuing a deal for the social-media company
body:
Wall Street indexes opened higher to start a busy week of earnings from big technology companies. Here’s what we’re watching in Monday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
